attributes.action: Decrease fireworks from 120 decibels within home environments
attributes.additional_details:
Fireworks for use within home environments currently reach 120 decibels. 

A petition has started for the use of fireworks to be used in public displays only- this has been declined.

 So this petition is to reduce the decibel volume of fireworks, consequently helping reduce stress to everyones animals! 

Bonfire night is one night but fireworks are let off before and days afterwards. We need to change something!
attributes.background: Many animals become extremely distressed by the use of fireworks within home environments. I have animals and the precautionary items available to buy to help reduce stress do not suffice.
